name: Chat History
description: Search and browse past conversations and messages.

functions.name: list_conversations
functions.description: List recent conversations with titles and dates. Returns newest first.

limit.description: Maximum number of conversations to return. Default 20, max 100.

offset.description: Number of conversations to skip for pagination. Default 0.

functions.name: search_conversations
functions.description: Search conversations by title. Returns matching conversations with their titles and dates.

query.description: Text to search for in conversation titles.

functions.name: search_messages
functions.description: Search across all messages for a keyword or phrase. Returns matching messages with their conversation ID, role, timestamp, and a content snippet. Use this to find past discussions on a topic.

query.description: Text to search for in message content.

role.description: Filter by role: 'user' or 'assistant'. Omit to search both.

functions.name: get_conversation
functions.description: Get all messages in a conversation, in chronological order. Use this to recreate a full chat.

functions.name: get_message
functions.description: Get the full content of a single message by its ID.
